query:
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS password_hash VARCHAR(255);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_users_password_hash ON users(password_hash);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2y6sS8DpnU5zjJD.root --database 9Rouc7DxCXtQDEEF5GnzG8 --execute ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS password_hash VARCHAR(255);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_users_password_hash ON users(password_hash);
